name: deviceState_setValue
description: This function is used to set a specific value on a SmartThings device, excluding volume or temperature adjustments.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the specific value.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The specific value to set on the device.

parameters.name: predefinedUnit
parameters.description: The predefined unit for the specific value to set on the device.
